message: Crap.  I am sorry I missed this.

Crap, I missed it too, but was meeting myself up :) I'm in way over my head, & would appreciate some collaboration: I'm working on a UAS proposal for DARPA, due this fall. If somebody could teach me CAD & laser cutting, that would rule!
I can teach you laser cutting!  I'll schedule a class soon.
I'll need to make up a few prototypes before cutting expensive materials, so it's not a rush. It would be appreciated, though!
Great! Is there a cover/drink minimum? ;-) You're making quad-rotor UAVs? Autonomous?

Any chance I can convince you folks tobring some older robotics projects and swing by the AlphaOne table at Wiliamsburg Walks after that? It's walking distance from AlphaOne and also on June 18th. We somehow got listed as doing a robotics demo in the printed materials so it'd be helpful to have some knowledgeable folk around.
Heh! Knowledgeable folk? I've heard tell of those. I'll let you know iff'n I meet 'un.
Anyone want to dress up as a robot?
Scroll down for YouTube clips of an octocopter: http://www.robotshop.com/oktokopter-2-fully-loaded-octocopter-uav.html
Thanks. I'll put that info into the NYC Robotics convore (https://convore.com/nyc-robotics/)
